website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a rugged camera, but don't want to sacrifice on-the-go sharing, the Nikon Coolpix AW110 is a good place to start.
pros: The Nikon Coolpix AW110 is rated to survive being underwater down to 59 feet and drops of up to 6.6 feet along with being freezeproof and dustproof
has built-in GPS for geotagging among other things and Wi-Fi for easy shooting and sharing with iOS and Android devices.
It is well priced considering its features and durability specs
cons: While its shooting performance is good, the camera's spongy buttons might slow you down a bit and the camera's slow lens requires a lot of light to get the best shots

customer_reviews.title: ... well however the "waterproof" feature seems more of a worst case scenario rather than something to play with in ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera is lightweight and works well however the "waterproof" feature seems more of a worst case scenario rather than something to play with in water. I did have mine for 3 years however it had very limited use and always kept in a camera case to try to preserve gasket/sealant life. I did like he camera but for the price I would of liked to see more Life out of this. I won't be buying another one. Why do that when you can get a waterproof case for your phone that guarantees to work or they buy you another one?
customer_reviews.author: tobusytothinkofsomethingclever

customer_reviews.title: Would have loved it if it was not broken when received.
customer_reviews.text: Previously had this model camera for several years and it worked great. Ordered one from this seller to take on a snorkeling trip because they said it had been tested and was working before being shipped. That would be impossible because the camera they shipped me was missing the internal tab that keeps the battery in place for power. It cannot work without the battery being seated properly in it's slot. Was very disappointed not to be able to take underwater photos on my 1st trip to the Cayman Islands. In short, camera model is great, but not from this seller... :-(
customer_reviews.author: JackieA

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Had some problems getting this product due to mail. But once we did receive it, I put the battery anf memory card in. It is very easy to use. I would recommend it to friend. ******update 4.24.17******* recieved flyer with product saying if i left a 5 star review i would get a free accessory kit (tripod,batter, ect.). Left one its about a month later and I haven't recieved anything. The product is easy to use but I took off 3 stars for being lied to. I cant stand false promises from manufactors or customer service. If anything changes ill update this again
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I had too many point-and-shoot cameras become useless because the retractable lens broke or got sand in it or something. This one doesn't have that problem. I also had a camera stop working because the door on the battery compartment wouldn't stay closed due to the fact that two of the little plastic feet holding it on had broken off. This one has a much more secure and durable battery door. The weak point on this camera is the LCD, which can be protected by a cheap screen protector. This camera is perfect for outdoor adventures - I've taken it skiing, hiking and on the water and it's been great. It takes lovely video and photos for being so small.
customer_reviews.author: moonski

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding camera for snorkeling and outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I've just returned from my second snorkeling trip with this camera and I love the quality pictures it takes underwater. Buy the special floating underwater wrist strap, the camera will float with that strap attached. The camera, in auto mode, will focus very well, even under water. Last trip I snap shot a spotted eagle ray going at least 10 mph and it came out perfect. Love this camera, I have it with me when I golf all the time and it takes great pictures above water as well. Good all around outdoor camera. The wifi connection to my android phone works well and is nice for getting pictures to facebook right away.
customer_reviews.author: J. A May

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is the second camera of this type I've bought. The first was lost or stolen. Once you have the settings in place, it's a great camera and I've taken thousands of great photos. It would be perfect if I could raise the camera to my eye and get the same picture I'm seeing with my naked eye. But in order to do that I have to bump the telephoto to about 1/4 increase to replicate what I'm seeing with my eye. If I don't do that, I'll get a distant shot. A real strength is battery life. I can shoot 100's of pictures over several days without changing or charging the battery.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mullady

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a recent 3,000 mile cross country bicycle ride and am very glad I did. The reviewers said the screen wasn't too good in bright sun and they were right BUT it also comes to life, ready to shoot, faster than the other ones reviewed and that was what I needed more than a bright screen. I had it out in rain, wind, blowing sand and had no issues. I could shoot it one handed while riding and took a few thousand shots over the 52 day ride. It takes great pics. I did NOT use 90% of the fancy features: GPS, WiFi, etc so can't comment on those.
customer_reviews.author: D. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Leaky battery compartment! Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this camera! Search the web, PLENTY of people complaining about the leaky battery door. My LCD stopped working after my second snorkel trip. I'm not stupid, I know how to close and properly latch the battery compartment. I actually like how hard it is to accidentally open the door, but the seal is garbage. If you're just using it on land and hoping the "waterproof" feature will protect you from accidental spills and such, I'm sure it will be fine. The camera worked great the few times I was able to use it on land, and worked fine for 1.5 snorkel trips.
customer_reviews.author: blr

customer_reviews.title: Nice point and shoot
customer_reviews.text: So far I have been very happy with this camera. I bought it to use on my ATV trips. I wanted a camera that kept track of GPS coordinates when taking pics and this does the job. When you turn it on you need to give it time to connect to the satellites or you won't get very accurate readings. The map system that comes with it is almost useless, especially since the battery life on this is not that great. The only reason I am not giving this 5 stars is the battery life. The battery life is not the worst I have seen but nowhere close to my old Canon Powershot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, nearly unusable in anything but perfect lighting conditions.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera because I heard it had the best image quality of the "tough" point and shoots. When you're standing completely still, shooting a stationary target in ideal lighting conditions, it produces decent photos. However, when it comes to real world use, most of your shots come out completely unusable. Blurred subjects, and horrible under/over exposure. I'm being completely serious when I say that iPhone cameras outperform the aw110 in real world use. My 8 year old midrange Canon powershot A540 outperforms the brand new aw110 in every way. Very disappointing. I'm sending it back for a refund asap. I'd suggest looking elsewhere for a tough camera.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Erickson

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera - I've traveled many places with this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera - I've traveled many places with this camera and have given it a beating multiple times. While it's not great in low-lighting and has a smaller zoom, it generally takes nice quality photos. It's a basic 'point and shoot' with some added features but for me the durability is a big selling point. I love it for trekking and outdoor sports. I purchased this almost three years ago and it still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Janel Swenson

customer_reviews.title: coolpix
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the like-new used category. I got the orange one because it was so much cheaper than the other colors. I figured it was because most would not want orange. It is actually a metallic-copper that is really cool. It takes great pics and is small. Its got an uber amount of features. The hd video is splendid. Loses something when you pan around quickly, but still vivid. The only thing I wish was different is the shutter button seems to want a little more pressure than I want to instinctively give and it makes me think that I moved the camera too much while taking pic. Regardless of my fears, it takes great photos. :0)
customer_reviews.author: shane archer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this.  Camera frequently freezes up/
customer_reviews.text: I have only taken this camera out twice, and both times, the camera has "locked up" or "frozen" after taking only a few pictures. I have to take the battery out to even get it to turn off. This is quite risky given the fact that I purchased it for use on the water and getting water in the battery compartment will ruin the camera. I have looked online and since discovered that I'm not the only one with this issue and Nikon doesn't seem to be able to fix it. Sad because I liked this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Donnafb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I was going to Australia and I was going to be going to the great barrier reef. I wanted to be able to take my camera in the water and get some pictures of the reef. I was a little nervous about putting it in the water (it just feels like a camera isn't something you should drop in salt water) but it was fine. The picture quality is fine. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Fonrin

customer_reviews.title: Nikon to Olympus
customer_reviews.text: I have changed my 5 star review due to the fact that every two to three years I have to replace this camera! I loved everything about it except for when it's done, it's done! First one I bought, the screen quit! You cant see if you are taking pictures or not! Tossed it and bought another and guess what, yep... same thing! First it quit turning on so I completely replaced the battery, didn't help! Sometimes it would work and then maybe not! Next was the screen, again...When it did periodically come on, you couldn't see the image... nothing... Done with Nikon! Just purchased an Olympus Tough T4, hope I have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Moon Jelly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!  This camera couldn't handle taking pictures in rain!
customer_reviews.text: At first this seemed like a great camera. After a few uses, though, the camera would no longer work after I took a picture while it was raining. I sent it in for repair and Nikon would not fix it because of "corrosion damage." I did absolutely nothing wrong that could have resulted in this type of damage, and I am 100% certain this is due to poor manufacturing. I am extremely disappointed that I wasted all of this money on a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris b.

customer_reviews.title: Good as long as it worked...
customer_reviews.text: I guess we should consider ourselves lucky this camera lasted as long as it did. Took it to the Galapagos Islands and got reasonably good pictures of sea turtles and other sea life while scuba diving. Then didn't use it for quite a while. Second time we tried to use it underwater, the screen died. Too bad the warranty I purchased with it expired a few months ago. Writing it off. No more underwater photography for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Hosier

customer_reviews.title: cool picxxxxx
customer_reviews.text: this is my second Coolpix..the last one I had was the later model aw100 and it laste dme about a year and a half.. this camera is the same but the zoom is different and the filter adapter is smaller?!? other than that the new qualities it comes with is awesome some I don't need and some are just handy.. all in all I wish they didn't discontinue this model..and I wished the newer ones had the filter adapter also
customer_reviews.author: PUKE13

customer_reviews.title: High quality camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very high quality. The build is tight and solid. I do not plan to take this camera scuba diving or sky diving but for a great camera to resist the weather and the occasional drop to a hard surface, this will do the job well. Easy to operate with intuitive controls, this little camera will feel great in your hands. Picture quality is excellent and equal to more expensive cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy England

customer_reviews.title: Check for leaks upon reciept !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews,( there were some mixed) I bought this for a trip to BVI. My mistake was not immediately soaking it in water to check for leaks. Day 1 camera leaked, that meant no diving or snorkeling pix for our entire trip. I was past the 30 days., Therefore no refund. I do not recommend this product based on my experience and if you do buy it, be smarter than I was and soak it in H2O when you get it to verify there are no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: otherwise it is very very good product underwater as well as up the water Thanks
customer_reviews.text: warrning don't be underwater more than 30 min . 2nd thing that if the water get inside it by mistake no one can fix it also the warranty will not cover that. otherwise it is very very good product underwater as well as up the water Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: AbuAbdalah

customer_reviews.title: Great over all pocket camera!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pocket camera with great lens for the money. I haven't used it yet underwater and this is the only reason for my four stars. The fact it is so good above water is the reason I haven't used underwater in case it floods, but eventually I will try submerging it and then I will correct my comments.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I had severals cameras for underwater photography, all of them, Nikon and CANON, but this is the powerful one. Its little, compact, and easy to manage underwater, you can carry in the pocked of the BC, and take it when you need. They make great pictures, underwater an in the air. Quality of image and videos are very good, and it has several characteristics that are plus, gps, altitude indicator, e.g.
customer_reviews.author: P. Lancho

customer_reviews.title: Good camera so far
customer_reviews.text: Went snorkeling a couple of times, about 2 hours each time. Took kayaking once. Worked well underwater, no leakage. Soaked the product in fresh water to remove the salt and waited until it was completely dry. No problems so far. Land pictures were good, indoor pics OK. I recommend buying a floating wrist strap or some other wrist strap to ensure the product is secure while swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE WIFI IS POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: Comes with case Great underwater shots, (about 10-12 ft saltwater) Wifi difficult to set up, and mine locked up (sending for a replacement) GPS is neat, but an easier wifi process would have been more beneficial Seems very rugged The NIkon floater strap is a must, and it DOES support the camera (salt water, not tested in fresh)
customer_reviews.author: PAUL

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this camera for the Great Barrier Reef because it had such great reviews and ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for the Great Barrier Reef because it had such great reviews and was waterproof, however the first time I used it (in the water) the screen went completely black and everything I could try did not work. It was brand new. I was SO lucky that the hostel had a camera I could rent!!! BUT it was an extra expense, and I much money lost, plus the money I now need to spend to get it repaired. VERY let down.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna valley

customer_reviews.title: Sand locked it up
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked nice u/w, on a mountain hike and day to day use. However I'm at the beach in the surf, some sandy wave rolls in the camera seizes with sand in the buttons and lens. Absolute frozen. I rinse, Q-tip and tweeter and get no where. I'm a semi pro photographer and love Nikon but just be aware of this one at the beach
customer_reviews.author: Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my Mom
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my mom as a gift. she really likes it. it doesn't take the best pictures- but its a point and shoot and more or less used for the waterproof aspect of it! she was able to take a ton of pictures while she was on her cruise without fear of getting it wet.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie W

customer_reviews.title: This refurbished camera did not perform up to expectation when under water
customer_reviews.text: I just took the camera to Maldives few days ago and used it at the beach front seawater. The camera was ok initially but later it was not functioning. After drying it and sitting for a few hours, all electronic functions & LCD were back to live by itself as water inside the camera dried out. However the lens remain full of vapour hence I still could not take sharp pictures and I have to wait for three days till it gets better. The camera looks 90% recovered today. I need to bring it to the Nikon camera center for detailed check. Please could you raise a case for me to bring it to the Nikon service center in Singapore?
customer_reviews.author: Michael See-Guan Yeo

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product - Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second underwater camera (previous being a Lumix one), and this one barely works. It is plagued by software issues and poor manufacturing. The screen starting showing random white lines after only a few days of use (not even having been underwater yet!) and it just went downhill from there, breaking down completely after a few weeks. We initially thought this would be a good product as we have a DSLR from Nikon, but we ended up very disappointed. Nikon seems to have focused more on adding dozens of useless gadgets as opposed to make a solid, sturdy products that takes good pictures. All this to say, we will stay away from Nikon products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Olivier Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far we have had this camera for a month and mostly used it on our cruise to the Bahamas. The camera takes great pictures on land and underwater. So far no leaks. The underwater pics need some post processing to clear the blue tint. I used basic color correction in Photoshop Elements and the pictures look great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Maldony

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for my wife because the last Nikon point-and-shoot we had she broke. So I thought one that is shock,water and freeze proof was just what we needed! + the wifi on it is a cool thing to have she can upload the photos she takes to her phone and then post them on FB. Great camera does everything it says it will do!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Leaked the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Recently went on a trip to Hawaii and was super excited to use this while snorkeling there. It worked great during my first use in the ocean. The pictures were incredible and it had good battery life. I let it dry completely for at least 24hrs before opening the case to charge the battery. When I put the battery back in it turned on without any problems and I made sure it was sealed before taking it back into the water but the second it hit the water it malfunctioned. I literally barely submerged the camera and it leaked. Wish it was really waterproof because the picture quality was amazing for underwater camera standards.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: great vacation camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for my vacation to the Cayman islands and Mexico so I knew I needed a waterproof camera as well as taking good pictures. This camera lived up to what I needed it to do and took amazing pictures as well as good underwater videos and pictures, didn't have any problems what so ever. The camera itself was nice and sturdy no cheap plastic feel. Very pleased with the choice of camera we bought on our vacation
customer_reviews.author: Torres

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera but I don't love it. It is indeed a tough little camera, and has even taken pictures under water. Picture quality could be better and its a little slow to fire up and shoot. But, the batteries last considerably longer than the small Sony I previously used. But given taking pictures is what a camera is all about, it has left me wanting more.
customer_reviews.author: Dr99

customer_reviews.title: this camera takes excellent quality pictures for a point-and-shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: this camera takes excellent quality pictures for a point-and-shoot camera. It has been used in many wet situations including snorkeling and floating rivers. Also has been used in the swimming pool. We have had no problems and love the pictures it takes.
customer_reviews.author: CountryMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent point & shoot
customer_reviews.text: I have had the camera for about two weeks and after reading the owner's manual this Nikon camera has performed extremely well. I pick this camera after speaking a person on a cruise, they had one and said it was great, they then dropped in the Jacuzzi and said it was water proof and shock proof. I have taken about 200 pictures and it does well in all settings. If looking for a point and shoot I recommend this over a cybershot.
customer_reviews.author: Lamar Crites

customer_reviews.title: this is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera a lot I would like the iOS software to be able to do a bit more a bit faster but it all works and rather nicely. Camera takes great pictures far far better then a phone can and even more important you can take pictures without breaking your phone to do so. It is small and light. And it is a Nikon so the quality implied is found there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks in a bath tub test
customer_reviews.text: Leaked just testing this in the bath tub. Took great close up pictures - really awesome compared to most of the cameras I have tried. But, if the camera is going to leak in 9 inches of water I don't think I would trust it even in a pool. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Z Moe

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Control and Bad Aftermarket Service
customer_reviews.text: This camera stopped working after a few months of light use. It was sent back to Nikon under warranty overnight ($40 shipping by me). They couldn't be bothered to let me know the status of the repair. They did finally send it back by the slowest (cheapest) possible UPS. It just showed up , no notice. Not what I'd expect from Nikon! Update-camera came back and failed again, immediately, when it got wet. Now back at Nikon again!Mark it down to one star and avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Hunt Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great Pics but LCD Screen Died!
customer_reviews.text: The camera indeed takes great pictures, that is just one of the reasons I bought it. On our trip to Hawaii, the LCD screen died so we have to send it in for repair. The camera is only 2 months old and was never used before this trip. Very disappointed since I did a ton of research on many underwater cameras and with the Nikon name, I thought that this would have been a better quality product. Buyer beware!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee Redys

customer_reviews.title: Takes amazing pictures!
customer_reviews.text: Takes great underwater pictures. We used this in Belize where the underwater life is incredible. The camera took great clear pictures. The video works great too. Goes from video to picture mode very easy. Great little camera for the price. Great quality pictures.
customer_reviews.author: NMSunsets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, lousy with outside night pics or in ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera, lousy with outside night pics or in a dark room trying to capture a moving target. But great daytime pics and can't beat the durability of this thing. Its my 2nd one, I lost the first to a Fair Carny that slammed the safety bar down on my legs, wasn't totaled but lost its dust proofness.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Mohler

customer_reviews.title: Best camera for the adventurer
customer_reviews.text: This camera traveled all over the world with me and endured water, high drops, heat, ice, etc. Unlike the other colors, the camo is a hard plastic and does not scratch as much or as easily as the metal colors. Highly suggest this camera to anyone who is an adventure traveler.
customer_reviews.author: Jenbun87

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: SO far amazing! The shutter speed is amazing!!! The wifi feature is really cool, however slightly confusing at first. I have not used it underwater. However I have recorded video outside on a very windy day, with a toddler speaking. I was able to hear the toddler very clearly with little to no excess wind noise. Very satisfied with this camera's video quality and picture quality. The built in filters make it photos quicker to edit. Perfect camera for travel as well as professional photos.
customer_reviews.author: President

customer_reviews.title: Broke after using it one time.
customer_reviews.text: Used the camera in the swimming pool one time. Afterwards, the power button is not working properly. No water appears to have got inside the camera, but I now have to push the button more than a dozen times to get the camera to turn on. I was never rough with the camera or dropped the camera. The camera takes great pictures, but really the camera is now useless if I can't turn it on. I did not listen to the other reviews for this camera before I bought it. However, I would recommend that you look for a different camera. This camera has its issues that still need to be worked out. Don't waste your money too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Grindol

customer_reviews.title: Not Working!
customer_reviews.text: its probably been 3 months i gave this camera as a gift... it doesn't work the individual used it all of three times... It seems as though water got on the inside and there is corrosion! I don't want to guess the problem but since we followed the instructions something is definitely wrong.. Considering the amount I paid for the camera i didn't expect lifetime usage but definitely more than 3 months!
customer_reviews.author: Keitha C.

customer_reviews.title: 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera Christmas 2013. By the end of February this camera would no longer accept a charge. I have the warranty but to get it fixed I have to prepay all postage/shipping/insurance and delivery costs to the repair facility. If you want a camera that is actually waterproof / shockproof, I recommend that you purchase the Nikon S31 instead.
customer_reviews.author: A. MUEHLENBRUCH

customer_reviews.title: ... owned this for a couple years and am very happy with the pix
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for a couple years and am very happy with the pix.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: We've been very happy with this camera. Use it all the time. Pool, beach, outside, anywhere. Haven't had any problems. And it takes really great photos. (I'm a photographer and I've been very pleased)
customer_reviews.author: E.E.

customer_reviews.title: Another Black screen
customer_reviews.text: Another voice warning you about this product. After about an hour of snorkeling I saw a little bit of fog forming between the glass and the screen of the camera. Another 30 minutes later, the screen wasn't able to turn on. The power button showed it was on, but the screen was black forever more. Nikon really needs to get its act together and recall these given this has been happening to so many people.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thorne

customer_reviews.title: It still works to this day and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in the spring of 2014. It still works to this day and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Nikon AW110 wifi waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this little camera. Macro is excellent. Start up for first picture is very fast. I took some underwater pictures in tide pools in California with great results. The only problem is once a while the focusing hunts and cannot lock into focus and you need to refocus again.
customer_reviews.author: H. Yeung

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Leaked after two days of use. I don't think I did anything wrong. Never opened it outdoors. I've been able to dry it out to the point where everything works except taking a photo. Won't accept sd card anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! I was worried that since it was a waterproof camera it wouldn't do well taking photos outside of the water. But it takes great photos! Love the GPS feature too! The only bad thing is the battery life is not that great. Maybe due to the GPS?
customer_reviews.author: stcastil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: lots of functions i really enjoy this camera easy of use and what it can do under water is very surprising. one minor drawback it is easy to get the lens dirty easy to to clean if you remember to clean it!!!
customer_reviews.author: G L P

customer_reviews.title: DRAIN BATTERIES LIKE A HELL
customer_reviews.text: YEAH, ANOTHER REFURB, MY MISTAKE, FEW THINKS, DRAIN BATTERIES LIKE A HELL, 100-120 SHOTS WITH ORIGINAL BATTERY AND 40 WITH AFTERMARKET, THERE IS NO OPTION TO SET UP FLASH WORKS ALL THE TIME, AUTO FLASH WORKS WITH FEW FIRST SHOTS AND THAN YOU MUST TURN OFF AND ON TO MAKE IT WORK, SUCKS, PROBABLY BECAUSE ITS REFURB, REST OF IT WORKS GREAT, PICTURE QUALITY IS OK, NO MORE COMPLAINS
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: a couple issues...
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera, but the zoom isn't what I'm used to with panasonic's similar model (which I returned due to audio problems), and it's SLOW slow slow on battery power in comparison. It is brand new and I also tried off-brand batteries in an attempt to get quicker pics.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Stopped turning on after one month!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our trip in Tahiti May/June 2014. Half of the trip it would turn on but wouldn't take pictures. Then when we got back from the trip and used it for one beach trip it stopped working altogether. Do not waste your money on this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Meissa

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, this camera is not even close to water proof
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. It was only used a handful of times and it became water damaged twice, or on roughly 50% of its uses. The second time was a month out of warranty, but Nikon still wanted $125 or more to repair the same issue that they did not repair the previous time it broke. I purchased because I had good luck with Nikon in the past, but not with this camera. Would highly recommend choosing a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Tenseconds2l8

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Took it on vacation in the Carreabean and it worked great. Did some snorkeling and it took great photos and cleaned up great for photos we took during the rest of our vacation. Pictures and video capability were great. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andysfc

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera !!!
customer_reviews.text: works great! underwater video was fantastic!! pictures are beautiful ! very good battery life and overall one of the best compact cameras I have ever owned. I have used this camera for eight months now and have had ZERO problems. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Best camera I have ever owned (for kids)
customer_reviews.text: Best camera I have ever owned (for kids). I love letting the kids use this whenever. There is little risk of them damaging it accidentally. It works great in bright light, and that is when you would be using an underwater camera.
customer_reviews.author: techie1974

customer_reviews.title: Good camera so far
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. It has survived one outing to the lake where it spent more time underwater than it did above. Picture quality is on par with my other Nikon PS camera (S9100). Certain colors seem a bit over saturated at times but I expected that, since my other Nikon camera does the same.
customer_reviews.author: rawill

customer_reviews.title: High quality, works perfectly, and so simple
customer_reviews.text: Used this snorkeling in the Bahamas. So simple to switch to underwater use. Still can't figure out how the camera outside of the battery/memory card chamber don't get ruined, but they don't. It's fantastic! The picture quality is amazing! Looks like something out of National Geographic. Other settings work great too. Love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: herethereandeverywhere

customer_reviews.title: this camara is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I will say this is my second camera, I do love the first one that much that i went for the second one, as my wife do not let me use the other one, lol... so i get mine!
customer_reviews.author: JeoJ2016

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera but the socket in which to connect it ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but the socket in which to connect it to the USB cable is lame and no longer connects. I don't need or understand the need for GPS.
customer_reviews.author: GP Hauler

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS AFTER ONE YEAR
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera just a little over a year ago for underwater pictures and Wi-Fi benefits. No problems until this weekend when water seeped into the camera and ruined everything. If you read manufacturer's warranty, it says waterproof packing may deteriorate after one year which should be replaced at your expense. They are right - mine crashed one year and 3 weeks later. My bad for not reading this before purchase. Will go back to Olympus as I did not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: KMJ

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself is excellent. Beautiful pictures. Love the features. However, Nikon could do their customers a great service by making the WiFi behave like other WiFi devices, or at a minimum offer more support features. It probably behaves wonderfully on a free WiFi hot spot, but getting it to connect to an encrypted connection is like pulling teeth. Oh well, there's always the USB tether...
customer_reviews.author: Scott Wehrly

customer_reviews.title: fogged up and the lens is blurry would not recommend this camera for anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought camera in December and worked well for 6 months, I went to a water park and took pictures and the camera, fogged up and the lens is blurry would not recommend this camera for anyone. Trying to get replacement or money back.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bauer

customer_reviews.title: This is good. I have literally climbed cliff faces with this ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good. I have literally climbed cliff faces with this bumping up against my chest, and it's still going strong and getting great photos. The depth perception is not amazing, though.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Was a great camera. Didn't take the best photos but because ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a great camera. Didn't take the best photos but because it was so rugged I took it climbing, scuba diving, surfing and swimming. Then one day it took a photo and the LCD screen went black. The camera still works, takes photos and functions, but the LCD screen doesn't work. It makes the camera useless as there is no viewfinder.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great point-n-shoot camera. Great for underwater shots of the kids, and the Wifi transfer to my phone makes it quick to upload to facebook when I'm not near my computer. And it's durable. The only complaint is the lack of a lens cover.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Solidly built and perfect for taking to the beach
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built and perfect for taking to the beach, on a boat, anywhere you don't want to take a camera you are afraid to drop. This thing has been through alot and is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Valdez

customer_reviews.title: I like mine so well I bought this one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I like mine so well I bought this one for my daughters grad gift. Goes in the ocean, snow and you can drop it ! The photos are Nikon quality. Use a highspeed card for faster photo snaps
customer_reviews.author: Ruth L

customer_reviews.title: Black screen - again.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for a trip to Curacao for snorkeling. Tried it out in the house - was happy with it. Turned it on again 2 days before leaving for trip - black screen. Had never left the house. Had never been in water. Returned to Amazon. Was able to purchase another at Best Buy the night before my trip. It lasted 10 days before, again, black screen. First time - fine, I got a lemon. Second time - inferior product, missed out on photos on my trip, never again!
customer_reviews.author: April A. White

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Got one camera, the waterproof seal broke for the lens and the battery and SD Card compartment. Got a 2nd camera (same model) and the seal on the battery compartment began to leak. Both were ordered for amazon. The reviews were good but the product was not!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera with awesome pics. The fact that it will take pictures under water is a plus. I love the size and the feel of this simple yet very effective device.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Not so waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this camera twice. Both times, it leaked while trying to take photos while snorkeling. I didn't have the camera deep in the water, but yet, the seal wasn't strong enough. The first time I thought it was a fluke. Not so much. Terrible underwater camera. I won't be buying Nikon for underwater use again. I'm disappointed as I've had other Nikon cameras that worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in march to take on vacation in may. The first time I went snorkeling with it it died within 1/2 hour. Since I have done all the troubleshooting I could find and it has not turned on since the first day of vacation. My friend bought a different brand and had no issues with hers... Life lessons I suppose since I had read the reviews. Hopefully their customer service will be better than the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: beverly charette

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use
customer_reviews.text: I am horribly upset I did not listen to other reviews. I missed so many chances for photos on my recent trip because the display screen stopped working after the first use. The pictures that it did take turned out great but this is quite expensive for a one time use camera. I was able to contact amazon and they were able to provide a full refund. Amazon customer service is never a disappointment, unlike this product!
customer_reviews.author: A. Le

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras, tough and durable. I keep a couple on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ScavnGerPro

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix AW110 - Best Camera I have
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. We took it to Disney World and it was awesome. Video is great quality and easy to use, the GPS is very accurate (+/- 5-6 feet) and the photos are great. I would recommend a fast 40mb/s or faster Class 10 SD card. Definitely helps with write speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Adi

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our cruise and it was perfect!! We used this for snorkeling in the Caribbean, swimming in the pools, to riding roller coasters!! Lasted thorough all of it!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great physical durability, but can not go the distance.
customer_reviews.text: I use this camera for work and my work requires me to take anywhere from 100 pictures a day to 500+. On the days of heavy use it starts to freeze up on me after taking about 150 pictures. I love the durability of the camera as I am in the construction industry, and the GPS function as well (required for work). I would not buy this camera again though do to the freezing it just takes me that much longer to get my work done.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Walters

customer_reviews.title: it is fine..
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it is fine... But suddenly the display turns black and it is not functional at all. It seems a lot of people is having this problem. Google it and you will know why is not a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Nikon COOLPIX AW110 Wi-Fi and Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS (Orange)
customer_reviews.text: My phone is not smart enough to take photos, so I ordered this camera to do the job. I'm sure it will take me a while to learn how to use all the features, but so far, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Fritofan

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because the camera became damaged after using underwater. I found that to be very disappointing since I was on a cruise and was unable to get the pictures I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bisha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product, fast delivery and product was as described. A++
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ray

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof camera??
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera on November, but after two days using it for snorkeling started failing. First screen went black all time and now camera doesn't turn on. Very disappointed about this camera, Nikon always make incredible products but now I'll choose another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Berger

customer_reviews.title: If you use it in the ocean it will leak ...
customer_reviews.text: If you use it in the ocean it will leak. The design is flawed. The tiniest piece of dirt will cause it to leak and it is ruined. I examined the waterproof seal with a 10x magnifying glass and it looked clean. I took it in the ocean and it leaked. Waist of money.
customer_reviews.author: WolfeDen

customer_reviews.title: A great little camera, but the shake feature is useless
customer_reviews.text: We live near the ocean and have boats and kayaks which we use regularly. I've always been afraid to use my "big" camera - a Nikon D-90 - when on the water - thus the purchase of the AW110. So far it has performed perfectly. Our grandkids have already given it a brutal test jumping into the salt water and snorkeling with it. I don't find the shake feature to be of any benefit and have turned it off - permanently. It's a real waste of technology. I'm looking forward to further exploring with the camera as we travel to diverse and harsh environments.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: camera isn't waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Wrong camera: I took a bath in a swimming pool and the camera was broken because now is full of water. I need to know where to ask for the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes beautiful pictures in and out of the water. I am very happy with this camera and would definitely recommend it. FYI it does NOT come with a case or a wrist strap.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mommles

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.. Wifi is a bit of a joke...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great - being that it's almost indistructible... But the WiFi is a real joke... Don't buy it for that reason - buy it for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Ragged Viking

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera took great shots out at stingray city in grand cayman and then great shots at the ruins in Costa Maya.
customer_reviews.author: matthew517

customer_reviews.title: The Best in class
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to take pictures, but it does so much more. WiFi Remote control through your phone. WiFi upload and down load. GPS on all photos posted to maps. GPS log of trip. I even used to world map to navigate while in Ecuador. It even has city streets and hotels.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald L. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. We've used in on several vacation. It takes amazing photos and videos. We had it submerged several feet while snorkeling and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Is not waterproof camera !
customer_reviews.text: Have sold this camera and in the first use in the water can not see nothing , screen was black. I have sent it back but they said that the battery was wet so they can not replace o give money back. So it is not waterproof
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: Loads of features, tough, and takes great pictures. My wife and I bought it for our Caribbean cruise at the end of this month, and we can't wait to use it. We've already used it for a few hikes and some pictures around the house, and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Okopuws

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX AW110 Wi-Fi and Waterproof Digital Camera with GPS (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackFROM THE MANUFACTURER




Above all else, taking pictures should be fun! The Fun & Innovative collection celebrates two core principles which are echoed throughout the COOLPIX line. Taking a different spin on taking pictures, each camera is unique from the next.

 The rush lasts a moment. The memory lasts a lifetime.
If you spend more time hanging from belay lines than waiting in club lines, if a snowy forecast makes you grin ear to ear, if you measure your weekends by bumps and bruises, meet your next favorite piece of gear: the waterproof, freezeproof and shockproof COOLPIX AW110. Built as rugged as you, the COOLPIX AW110 captures your extreme moments as mind-blowing photos, Full HD 1080p videos and ultra-smooth slow motion sequences. With built-in Wi-Fi® for instant sharing, a full-featured GPS with mapping, Points of Interest and Electronic Compass plus all the imaging power of a Nikon, you can finally bring home the rush of going big.






READY FOR EXTREME ADVENTURES
WATERPROOF, SHOCKPROOF AND FREEZEPROOF
The COOLPIX AW110 can handle all that Mother Nature can throw at it. Take it diving to depths of up to 59-feet. Shoot at temperatures as cold as 14° F. And don't sweat drops of up to 6.6 feet. Whether it's in your hand, mounted to a surfboard, clipped on a backpack or attached to a scuba tank, every twist, splash, dive and crash can be recorded in both still and Full HD 1080p movies. Plus, Nikon's Action Control brings fast and easy operation to gloved hands. The COOLPIX AW110 lets you capture every thrilling moment from inside the action—not the sidelines.

SHARE AMAZING PHOTOS IN AN INSTANT
BUILT-IN WI-FI® FOR EASILY SHARING YOUR SHOTS ANYTIME, ANYWHERE
The COOLPIX AW110 makes it easier than ever to share beautiful views of your world.Take a great shot and instantly send it to your compatible smartphone, tablet or any Wi-Fi device. Then use your smart device to email it, text it, or upload it to your favorite social networking or photo album sites—share it the same way you normally share online. Your friends and family will be amazed by the shots you share!

SEE WHERE YOU'VE BEEN
BUILT-IN GPS, MAPPING, ELECTRONIC COMPASS AND POINTS OF INTEREST (POI) FOR CREATING AMAZING PHOTO JOURNALS
Relive the excitement of your travels in a whole new way. The COOLPIX AW110 records the exact location of each shot you take, so you can follow the path of your adventure and every stunning view along the way! Share your journeys on Google Earth™, Google+™, and other social networking sites, or with the included Nikon View NX2 software. Built-in mapping and Electronic compass also help you navigate unfamiliar destinations, and Points of Interest (POI) show you nearby photo-ops like scenic lookouts and historic landmarks. The COOLPIX AW110 is the ultimate travel companion!



RECORD SUPERIOR VIDEOS
1080P FULL HD VIDEOS WITH STEREO SOUND FOR DAZZLING MOVIES
If you want a compact camera that shoots stunning Full HD videos, the COOLPIX AW110 delivers. 1080p Full HD means exceptional video quality. Record the action, then connect to an HDTV and watch your videos come alive. A built-in mic records high-quality audio in stereo. Your videos will look and sound phenomenal.



PREMIUM ACCESSORIES
Nikon All Weather Sport Case with Carabiner 

All weather case for the Nikon COOLPIX AW1100 Nikon EN-EL12 Rechargeable Li-Ion Battery

The EN-EL12 is a rechargeable Li-ion battery providing 3.7v and 1050 mAh of power to select Nikon COOLPIX digital cameras.
feature_bullets: Lens-shift and electronic VR image stabilization

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars639 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
